value.title: We paid a Pro to do Troll Builds: Dance a Colosuss in their Base! | Twitch Plays Gabe  - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: We paid Heromarine (Big Gabe) to participate in a Twitch Plays Gabe segment for PiGFest - and he delivered by dropping a Colossus into the opponent's base and DANCING THEM! Has anyone ever realised how cool it looks when collossi dance? Also they can still attack while doing so  Heromarine's stream:
